cd-bar1-link-desc:-u: On Default Tokens created by doing a drop onto the virtual table top, link the Bar 1's value to this attribute. If set this will override all other bar settings.
cd-bar1-max-desc:-u: On Default Tokens created by doing a drop onto the virtual table top, set the Bar 1's max to this attribute.
cd-bar1-value-desc:-u: On Default Tokens created by doing a drop onto the virtual table top, set the Bar 1's value to this attribute.
cd-bar2-link-desc:-u: On Default Tokens created by doing a drop onto the virtual table top, link the Bar 2's value to this attribute. If set this will override all other bar settings.
cd-bar2-max-desc:-u: On Default Tokens created by doing a drop onto the virtual table top, set the Bar 2's max to this attribute.
cd-bar2-value-desc:-u: On Default Tokens created by doing a drop onto the virtual table top, set the Bar 2's value to this attribute.
cd-bar3-link-desc:-u: On Default Tokens created by doing a drop onto the virtual table top, link the Bar 3's value to this attribute. If set this will override all other bar settings.
cd-bar3-max-desc:-u: On Default Tokens created by doing a drop onto the virtual table top, set the Bar 3's max to this attribute.
cd-bar3-value-desc:-u: On Default Tokens created by doing a drop onto the virtual table top, set the Bar 3's value to this attribute.
char-to-templates-info: Character names are added to the roll template by default (PC and NPC).
npc-info: The NPC option sets new characters to default to the NPC card style sheet. Useful if the player characters have already been created and all new character sheets added to the game will likely representing non player characters.
whisp-rolls-gm-info: All sheet rolls are sent to all players in chat by default. Query Whisper option gives you a prompt with each roll of whether or not the roll should be sent privately only to yourself and the GM. Always Whisper Rolls will send all rolls only to yourself and the GM.
